example.eg: Bill threw the stick and the dog retrieved it.
example.egtrans: 比尔把棍子扔出去，狗跑去捡了回来。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 重新得到, 追回, 取回, 捡回

dsense.name: retrieve [sth]
dsense.guideword: (get, find: computer files, data) (电子资料等)

example.eg: Linda hoped she would be able to retrieve her files after her computer crashed.
example.egtrans: 电脑死机了，琳达希望能恢复自己的文件。
